alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Iron, southeastern Ashland and eastern Price Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Upson, to 8 miles southwest of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, to near Prentice, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spirit and Mercer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Wisconsin.
